event.title: 40 years of software freedom and the FSF: join the celebrations in Warsaw, Poland

body.p: The FSFE is joining the celebrations of its sister organisation, the Free Software Foundation, and its 40 years of commitment to software freedom.

On 29 May, members of the FSFE will join the local celebrations in Warsaw (Poland). The event will include various activities to learn about what Free Software is and the work of the FSF over the last 40 years, as well as a panel discussion on software freedom and machine learning.
This celebration will take place from 18:00-21:00 CET, in the University of Warsaw Library (BUW) room 256.
"Participation is gratis but you will be required to register when entering the Library. Registration starts at 17:30 CET.
Some more data protection-related information is at: https://libreplanet.org/wiki/FSF40/meetups#Poland
